TopicTitle: Getting to the Mun and Back! An Instructive Youtube Series

Articles.Content:
]Hello everyone, I am pretty new to Kerbal Space Program, but I enjoy it immensely, I'm also a young aspiring video editor who uses Youtube to practice my skills. I'm making a Kerbal Series, and since you all are the Kerbal Experts, I would like all of your opinions on my new video! I appreciate everyones time as I'm very much still trying to learn.

[/video

Thanks again guys!

Giant|2obot

Liked the introduction of Jebediah, as he definitely looked happy. However, I switched off shortly afterwards at the mention of thrust/weight ratios while you were still on the launch pad. As a series aimed at beginners, I think you need to keep it fun as well as informative, and try and avoid technical talk which may only serve to bewilder, or possibly make the game itself sound too difficult.

If you want to get technical, maybe use it in a series explaining why some rockets fail to get to orbit/Mun/wherever when they are very similar in design to a rocket that can make such a flight.
